# Introduction

[Debian](https://www.debian.org/) is a free Linux operating system that is
related to Ubuntu. Most common hardware is supported. Get it
[**here**](https://www.debian.org/distrib/). Documentation is
[**here**](https://www.debian.org/doc/). Installation guides are
[**here**](https://www.debian.org/releases/stable/installmanual).
